No:NYKS/4207/363/Ktg.Mission: The mission of BWS is to provide sustainable solutions to the problems of the most vulnerable members of society, with a focus on self- sufficiency through appropriate use of resources at their disposal. Border Welfare Society have been concentrating on various developmental activities towards the rural & poor people, women and children in and around the three districts of Barak Valley in Assam, Since 2010 with outmost dedication and determination of the stewardship of Founder Kapil Ahmed Barbhuiya.VISION: Establishing a society of equals, free from social,gender and classdiscrimination, recognizing and protecting, human rights and providing equal opportunities to all its members.  A society where every individual is enabled to explore and express her/his innate potential.
